Token.Abstract: Adds an observer to an object conforming to NSKeyValueObserving.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The property to observe, relative to the reciever.

Parameter.Name: task
Parameter.Abstract: A block with no return argument, and a single parameter: the reciever.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns a globally unique process identifier for removing observation with removeObserverWithBlockToken:.

Token.Abstract: Adds an observer to an object conforming to NSKeyValueObserving.

Parameter.Name: keyPaths
Parameter.Abstract: An array of properties to observe, relative to the reciever.

Parameter.Name: task
Parameter.Abstract: A block with no return argument and two parameters: the reciever and the key path of the value change.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A unique identifier for removing observation with removeObserverWithBlockToken:.

Token.Abstract: Adds an observer to an object conforming to NSKeyValueObserving.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The property to observe, relative to the reciever.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: The NSKeyValueObservingOptions to use.

Parameter.Name: task
Parameter.Abstract: A block with no return argument and two parameters: the reciever and the change dictionary.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns a globally unique process identifier for removing observation with removeObserverWithBlockToken:.

Token.Abstract: Adds an observer to an object conforming to NSKeyValueObserving.

Parameter.Name: keyPaths
Parameter.Abstract: An array of properties to observe, relative to the reciever.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: The NSKeyValueObservingOptions to use.

Parameter.Name: task
Parameter.Abstract: A block responding to the reciever, the key path, and the KVO change.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A unique identifier for removing observation with removeObserverWithBlockToken:.

Token.Abstract: Adds an observer to an object conforming to NSKeyValueObserving.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The property to observe, relative to the reciever.

Parameter.Name: token
Parameter.Abstract: An identifier for the observation block.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: The NSKeyValueObservingOptions to use.

Parameter.Name: task
Parameter.Abstract: A block responding to the reciever and the KVO change. observation with removeObserverWithBlockToken:.

Token.Abstract: Adds an observer to an object conforming to NSKeyValueObserving.

Parameter.Name: keyPaths
Parameter.Abstract: An array of properties to observe, relative to the reciever.

Parameter.Name: token
Parameter.Abstract: An identifier for the observation block.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: The NSKeyValueObservingOptions to use.

Parameter.Name: task
Parameter.Abstract: A block responding to the reciever, the key path, and the KVO change. observation with removeObserversWithIdentifier:.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The property to stop observing, relative to the reciever.

Parameter.Name: token
Parameter.Abstract: The unique key returned by addObserverForKeyPath:task: or the identifier given in addObserverForKeyPath:identifier:task:.

Token.Abstract: Removes multiple block observers with a certain identifier.

Parameter.Name: token
Parameter.Abstract: A unique key returned by addObserverForKeyPath:task: and addObserverForKeyPaths:task: or the identifier given in addObserverForKeyPath:identifier:task: and addObserverForKeyPaths:identifier:task:.
